content.raw: I made changes in branch [sim_api_jackie](#!/osrf/haptix-comm/branch/sim_api_jackie) to reflect the new [sim_api PR](#!/osrf/haptix_api/pull-request/9/new-sim-api) and changes that came up during implementation. You can see the Gazebo-side implementation in `HaptixWorldPlugin` in branch [implement_sim_api](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/implement_sim_api) of handsim. Can you review and merge in?
content.html: I made changes in branch sim_api_jackie to reflect the new sim_api PR and changes that came up during implementation. You can see the Gazebo-side implementation in HaptixWorldPlugin in branch implement_sim_api of handsim. Can you review and merge in?
